definition: to escape, either physically or mentally
details:
verb
- to escape, either physically or mentally
= example: to escape, either physically or mentally
= synonyms: evade
- to evade payment to
= example: to evade payment to
- to hinder or prevent the efforts, plans, or desires of
= example: to hinder or prevent the efforts, plans, or desires of
= synonyms: spoil
- to cheat somebody out of what is due, especially money
= example: to cheat somebody out of what is due, especially money
